name: Midax Proxy
description:
THIS GAME IS A SUBMISSION FOR MINI JAM 85: GOLD

STORY

You are a proxy work for Midax: a gold enthusiast master. Your job is to find as much gold as possible in 1 min before the cave collapsed.

CONTROL

WASD or Arrow for move

C for gather gold ore

CREDITS

Art, Music, Code  Nguyễn Hoàng "uaigolem" Khang with the help of my good friend Nguyễn Quách "t520" Nguyên
